00079 inline void trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( InstanceNode* instanceNode, Transform parentWTO,QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > >* surfacesList )
00080 {
00081 
00082         if( !instanceNode ) return;
00083         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00084         if( !coinNode ) return;
00085 
00086         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00087         {
00088                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >(coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00089                 Transform objectToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( nodeTransform );
00090                 Transform worldToObject = objectToWorld.GetInverse();
00091 
00092                 BBox nodeBB;
00093                 Transform nodeWTO(worldToObject * parentWTO );
00094                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionTransform( nodeWTO );
00095 
00096                 for( int index = 0; index < instanceNode->children.count() ; ++index )
00097                 {
00098                         InstanceNode* childInstance = instanceNode->children[index];
00099                         ComputeSceneTreeMap(childInstance, nodeWTO, surfacesList );
00100 
00101                         nodeBB = Union( nodeBB, childInstance->GetIntersectionBBox() );
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionBBox( nodeBB );
00105 
00106         }
00107         else
00108         {
00109                 Transform shapeTransform = parentWTO;
00110                 Transform shapeToWorld = shapeTransform.GetInverse();
00111                 BBox shapeBB;
00112 
00113                 if(  instanceNode->children.count() > 0 )
00114                 {
00115                         InstanceNode* shapeInstance = 0;
00116                         if( instanceNode->children[0]->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00117                                 shapeInstance =  instanceNode->children[0];
00118                         else if(  instanceNode->children.count() > 1 )  shapeInstance =  instanceNode->children[1];
00119 
00120                         if( shapeInstance )
00121                         {
00122                                 TShape* shapeNode = static_cast< TShape* > ( shapeInstance->GetNode() );
00123                                 shapeBB = shapeToWorld( shapeNode->GetBBox() );
00124 
00125                                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionTransform( shapeTransform );
00126                                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionBBox( shapeBB );
00127 
00128                                 TShapeKit* surface = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( coinNode );
00129                                 surfacesList->push_back( QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform >( surface, shapeTransform ) );
00130                         }
00131                 }
00132 
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 inline void trf::CreatePhotonMap( TPhotonMap*& photonMap, QPair< TPhotonMap* , std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > > photonsList )
00138 {
00139         if( !photonMap )  photonMap = photonsList.first;
00140 
00141         std::vector< RayTracerPhoton >::iterator it;
00142         it = photonsList.second.begin();
00143 
00144         int rayLength;
00145         while( it < photonsList.second.end() )
00146         {
00147                 rayLength = 1;
00148                 Photon* first = new Photon( it->pos, it->shapeFront, 0, 0, 0, it->intersectedSurface );
00149                 Photon* nextPhoton = first;
00150 
00151                 while( (++it)<photonsList.second.end() && ( it->id > 0 ) )
00152                 {
00153                         Photon* photon = new Photon( it->pos, it->shapeFront, nextPhoton, 0, 0, it->intersectedSurface );
00154 
00155                         nextPhoton->next = photon;
00156                         nextPhoton = photon;
00157 
00158                         rayLength++;
00159                 }
00160                 photonMap->StoreRay( first, rayLength );
00161         }
00162         photonsList.second.clear();
00163 }
